::: {.hero-bio}
I spend my days teaching machines to understand Arabic — the language of the Quran, the language that shaped civilizations, the language that deserves to lead in AI, not follow.

Currently researching **efficient embedding models** that run on **edge devices** and **low-resource environments**, building **AI agents** at xbites, and pushing Arabic NLP forward at **Hamza Salem Lab**.
:::

::: {.hero-focus}
My mission: bring Arabic AI to everyone — from powerful servers to your phone. Every small model I create, every optimization I make, is a step toward making Arabic AI accessible to all, regardless of their resources.
:::
